title: Add pipeline example template + update JSON schema
description: Create templates/examples/pipeline-feature.yaml demonstrating full pipeline template format with type, target, description, acceptance_criteria, validation_strategy, constraints, scope. Update templates/schemas/task-template.schema.json to match new parser schema.

title: Define validation phase type interfaces
description: Create src/validation/types.ts with interfaces: IGateConfig, IGateResult, IGateFailure, IValidationResult, IValidationHistory. Define GateType union. These are consumed by gate-runner, gate-parsers, validation-runner, beads-mapper, and pipeline-controller.

title: Implement gate runner (single gate execution)
description: Create src/validation/gate-runner.ts. Executes a single gate command via execFile, captures stdout/stderr/exitCode/duration. For manual gates, uses inquirer prompt (same pattern as src/utils/breakpoint-handler.ts). Returns IGateResult.

title: Create git operations utility
description: Create src/utils/git.ts with git operations using the shell utility: mergeBranch, getCurrentBranch, checkoutBranch, pushBranch, fetchAll. All use execFile for safety.

title: Implement beads failure mapper (gate failures to bd create)
description: Create src/validation/beads-mapper.ts. BeadsMapper groups failures intelligently (multiple errors in same file = one issue). Constructs structured issue descriptions per validation-gates.md format. Executes bd create via execFile. Returns created issue IDs.

title: Build pipeline phases 4 & 5 + parser alignment
description: Implement the missing pipeline phases (validation, artifacts) and align the template parser to the full spec from template-spec.md. This completes the 5-phase pipeline architecture documented in docs/methodology.md.
close_reason: All 14 child issues completed. Pipeline phases 4 & 5 implemented, parser aligned to full spec.

title: Extend template parser to full spec schema
description: Add new Zod schemas (TaskType, Target, ValidationGate, EmsExtensions) to src/parsers/index.ts. Update TemplateSchema with all fields from docs/template-spec.md. Add target→repository normalization. Add validatePipelineTemplate() strict validator. Fix URL validation for SSH git URLs. Maintain backward compatibility with existing templates.
close_reason: Parser updated with all pipeline fields, backward compat verified

title: Verification: build, backward compat, dry-run tests
description: Run npm build (no type errors). Verify spawnee validate on existing templates (backward compat). Verify spawnee validate on new pipeline-feature.yaml. Verify spawnee run --dry-run --validate shows gate config. Close epic on success.
close_reason: All verification checks passed: build, backward compat (5 templates), pipeline validation, dry-run

title: Implement artifact generator (PR, test report, audit trail)
description: Create src/artifact/generator.ts. ArtifactGenerator merges branches, creates PR via gh pr create, generates test report from IValidationHistory, exports beads audit trail. Handles both success and failure artifacts. Create src/artifact/index.ts barrel exports.

title: Create shell execution utility (execFile wrapper)
description: Create src/utils/shell.ts wrapping child_process.execFile. Returns {stdout, stderr, exitCode, durationMs}. Does NOT throw on non-zero exit codes. Uses argument arrays for injection safety. Configurable cwd and timeout.

title: Implement validation runner (sequential gate orchestration)
description: Create src/validation/validation-runner.ts. ValidationRunner extends EventEmitter. Runs all gates in sequence (no short-circuit). Emits gateStarted/gatePassed/gateFailed/validationComplete events. Returns IValidationResult. Create src/validation/index.ts barrel exports.

title: Implement pipeline controller (retry loop, phase orchestration)
description: Create src/core/pipeline-controller.ts. PipelineController extends EventEmitter. Manages Phase 3→4→5 lifecycle. Wraps Orchestrator (does not modify it). Implements QA retry loop: execute → validate → create issues → re-execute. Handles max_qa_cycles escalation.

title: Implement gate output parsers (typecheck, unit, e2e, lint)
description: Create src/validation/gate-parsers.ts with per-gate-type parsers: parseTypecheckOutput, parseUnitOutput, parseE2eOutput, parseLintOutput. Each returns IGateFailure[] from raw command output. Fallback: single catch-all issue if structured parsing fails.

title: Define artifact phase type interfaces
description: Create src/artifact/types.ts with interfaces: IArtifactOptions, IArtifactResult. IArtifactOptions takes template, validationHistory, taskResults, featureBranch, repoWorkDir, success flag.

title: Integrate pipeline into CLI (flags, new commands)
description: Modify src/index.ts. Add --validate, --artifact, --repo-dir flags to run command. When --validate set, use PipelineController instead of Orchestrator. Add standalone commands: spawnee validate-gates and spawnee artifact. Preserve existing behavior without new flags.
close_reason: CLI integration complete: --validate, --artifact, --repo-dir flags, validate-gates and validate-pipeline commands
